skill.name: behaviors.skills.MoveAlong
skill.description: To follow a path defined as an ordered set of way-points by the user. The skill performs by activating the MoveTo action skill with one entity at a time, in the specified order.

link.name: moveTo
link.description: To enact the decision to reach each of the given way-points.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when the last waypoint has been reached.
